name: Welcome to Abkhazia
description:
OVERVIEW

A multi-layered running adventure, tasked to escape the toxic wastelands of Abkhazia through navigating its fallen double-decker-city.

INSTRUCTIONS

The overall objective is survive. 

  • Press space to jump above enemies, and again for a double-jump if you're below the upper level.
  • Hold left shift to fall faster.

Avoid hitting acid rain, the zombies or the pits of death.

The ladder is there to help you get up or down.

CREDITS
